Text:
I like how you jump from one historical period to the other with your diverse material subjects. That just keeps the curiosity and enthusiasm to learn  and sometimes to entertain alive.
Thank you!!
What a hero you are for this! Thank you!

amazing series; on par or better than the HBO mini-series.  thank you.

do you have Magnificent Yankee, Louis Brandeis people's Attorney, or Thurgood?
Thurgood isn't out on DVD yet, and the other two are a tad pricey on Amazon.
